title: Ridiculous server lag??
body: I've asked around and it's been happening to other people, but almost every game today and yesterday there's been so much lag.

replies.body: Nope, all different. It's been going on since the last patch, really irritating.

Use the "Reply" feature to reply to people's comments, otherwise they won't get notification.

Are you still experiencing the lag?
Not for me. Was it that the people you asked were all on the same ISP?
